description:
Actor Tony Todd has been a major player in the horror genre for decades. His performances in films including Candyman, Final Destination, and Hatchet made him into a true icon. Sadly, it’s been confirmed that Tony Todd has passed away at age 69. The information regarding Todd’s death was shared via Deadline by his representatives. [...]

The post ‘Candyman’ And ‘Final Destination’ Star Tony Todd Dead At 69 appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Candyman’ And ‘Final Destination’ Star Tony Todd Dead At 69
